text:
Message 931 of 4024
I was thinking about this a bit more. I can either have a deck and links, or we can go through each of these three things together on the fly. We can
start with you and me, or with the kids. We can do it on my phone, laptop, or your phone, laptop.
Or I can put it on the big screen if you like. I will take any special request you like and accommodate. We can use either of our accounts or both.
There is nothing to set up or can or set up ahead of time. It's all real and legit because ... it is.
Sent:02/01/2024 at 07:26 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/02/2024 at 06:59 AM)
Subject:Re: As We Discussed
